message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. Your turn!
Let's be fair and split the money evenly. We both get a good amount that way.
You rejected my first offer, so I'm taking a slightly tougher stance this time. Let's see if you'll accept this one!
I'm willing to give you a good share, but I need to make sure I get a fair amount too. Let's split it 60/40 this time.
